New Records: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Tarik Skubal, tying the most runs Skubal allowed in 2024.
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas' grand slam in the fifth inning was a turning point, and the Guardians won the game despite not being expected to contend.
Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians, under manager Stephen Vogt, defied expectations to win the AL Central and reach the ALCS.
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers' season ended with a loss, while the Guardians aimed for their first World Series since 1948.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams had a history of 2,300+ games, with their last meeting in 2022.
